channel.title: Codeusa - Quest, Pest Control, God Wars, Barrows, Staking, & Much more!
channel.description:
[img]http://codeusa.net/poster.jpg[/img]
Videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FXHd9BqrEd0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FXHd9BqrEd0[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2k-Df4IPfJQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2k-Df4IPfJQ[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bCDEbSxsY18]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bCDEbSxsY18[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwGBmdYbeHk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwGBmdYbeHk[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gwFm9c23LQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gwFm9c23LQ[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a9TFL2lqbvs]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a9TFL2lqbvs[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6TkJu8G-uQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6TkJu8G-uQ[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=omhjddAfRG0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=omhjddAfRG0[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHDf1t8W7GU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHDf1t8W7GU[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24MCbkl8XTo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24MCbkl8XTo[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iz4W80TmmuQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iz4W80TmmuQ[/url]
So what more do you need? Come join us, help us branch out and take control. This is your story, you make it.
links for play: Register your account on our forums @: [url=http://codeusa.net/forums/register.php]CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Register[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKbZRDI0bGo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKbZRDI0bGo[/url]
Download our desktop client at [url=http://codeusa.net/download]CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Downloads[/url]
Play online at [url=http://codeusa.net/play]CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Webclient[/url]
Be sure to login with your forum username and password. Case sensitive!
Need help getting started?
[url=http://codeusa.net/guide]CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Guide[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qhaRK.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xNWlM.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3MEP2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i56Unh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sWxCSh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UVVOZh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YfXHUh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UFwZwh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/r6mWfh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/J49bqh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AXfa9h.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nMFnqh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bAUnFh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5Qj9sh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rcaLJh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ak3M5h.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PvAMch.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WH3tbh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tN5IYh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hOVthh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hcKdDh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZggdWh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vcDdT.jpg[/img] [/center] More media. [img]http://i.imgur.com/SwkEY.jpg[/img] Visit Varrock to pick up some special prizes for your hard work of skilling. Just added.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5XZKiZFSPM8]In-game Titles - YouTube[/url] You can create furniture at the workshop and take it to your home and use it to build. You will also need nails, hammer etc.
A few more in game screenies.
[IMG]http://codeusa523.org/media/images/6_full.png[/img]
[IMG]http://codeusa523.org/media/images/4_full.png[/img]
This is something I started working on a week ago but got caught up, so enjoy your gold ore mining and rocktail fishing and mineral deposits.
Getting there: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QuAOD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rPTN8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILpSI.png[/img]
Pretty much the same way as Runescape.
I introduced the dragon pickaxe into npc drop tables and added a incentive for skilling.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33m03l3.jpg[/img]
Updated graphics
Began converting server, have login and a lot of stuff done.
50 to 60 peak. 20 to 30 average.
Updates: Imps now follow paths and no longer noclip. Goliath gloves. Melee combat tune ups Hiscores fixed, no more negative xp. fixed rocktail respawn rates.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6vmwf.jpg[/img]
Updates: Trunicated hiscores to fix bug with negative xp values, good fight 5066 users . tuned up all combat accuracy and base. Updated some animations and graphics to replace old ones. Fixed CSS on the website.
Got window pane on conversion server and a few other things.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sA0JB.png[/img]
Player count hasn't dropped under 45 all day.
Love seeing the community grow, leave some feedback here or on the forums of what should be done/change.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pb9PD5e5NeI&feature=youtu.be]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pb9PD5e5NeI&feature=youtu.be[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUSw469_XqA]Codeusa - The Best Runescape Private Server (RSPS) - YouTube[/url]
For those who missed it [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUSw469_XqA]Codeusa - The Best Runescape Private Server (RSPS) - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BcUqb.png[/img]
Also trying to decide if I should add some cosmetic voting rewards (custom colored rares?) that are non tradeable.
Dicing will return, I added the roll option back to the item defs.
As stated above
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UUBjG.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J6ZsH.jpg[/img]
The new cosmetic items don't have a defined release date.
Ghost mouse, auto clickers, one person made a reflection bot
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YH9vA.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQo6C.png[/img] Coming soon I guess (custom party hats won't be on the ge, just showed as a test)
[url=http://youtu.be/RPKD6WEolSU]Tzhaar Updates & New Quest - YouTube[/url]
Tonight update
Updated models of a few items
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ANbFY.png[/img] [IMG]https://sphotos-b.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-snc6/165884_443034335719982_1422320859_n.jpg[/img]
and because I liked them, I changed wild skulls
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2PhvO.png[/img]
Not a 24/7 stream yet, but it will be online and hosted by multiple Dj's. Music, updates, interviews more. Something new
[url=http://codeusa.net/radio]CodeUSA - Radio: DJ JoJo[/url]
Double xp is on until friday
Visit lumbridge and speak to The Doctor to begin unlocking some fancy lodestones
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EYQxH.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wlAke.jpg[/img]
Latest update is FoG
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1lMCC.bmp[/img]
[url=http://blog.codeusa.net/post/70064444859/clan-wars-release]The Codeusa Software Development Blog - Clan Wars Release![/url]
Clan wars is here.

Play online at CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Webclient

Be sure to login with your forum username and password. Case sensitive!

Need help getting started?

CODEUSA THE No.1 FREE ONLINE RPG - Guide
























[/center]
More media.

Visit Varrock to pick up some special prizes for your hard work of skilling. Just added.

In-game Titles - YouTube
You can create furniture at the workshop and take it to your home and use it to build. You will also need nails, hammer etc.

A few more in game screenies.

This is something I started working on a week ago but got caught up, so enjoy your gold ore mining and rocktail fishing and mineral deposits.

Getting there:

Pretty much the same way as Runescape.

I introduced the dragon pickaxe into npc drop tables and added a incentive for skilling.

Updated graphics

Began converting server, have login and a lot of stuff done.

50 to 60 peak. 20 to 30 average.

Updates:
Imps now follow paths and no longer noclip.
Goliath gloves.
Melee combat tune ups
Hiscores fixed, no more negative xp.
fixed rocktail respawn rates.

Updates:
Trunicated hiscores to fix bug with negative xp values, good fight 5066 users .
tuned up all combat accuracy and base.
Updated some animations and graphics to replace old ones.
Fixed CSS on the website.

Got window pane on conversion server and a few other things.

Player count hasn’t dropped under 45 all day.

Love seeing the community grow, leave some feedback here or on the forums of what should be done/change.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pb9PD5e5NeI&feature=youtu.be

Codeusa - The Best Runescape Private Server (RSPS) - YouTube

For those who missed it Codeusa - The Best Runescape Private Server (RSPS) - YouTube

Also trying to decide if I should add some cosmetic voting rewards (custom colored rares?) that are non tradeable.

Dicing will return, I added the roll option back to the item defs.

As stated above


The new cosmetic items don’t have a defined release date.

Ghost mouse, auto clickers, one person made a reflection bot



Coming soon I guess (custom party hats won’t be on the ge, just showed as a test)

Tzhaar Updates & New Quest - YouTube

Tonight update

Updated models of a few items


and because I liked them, I changed wild skulls

Not a 24/7 stream yet, but it will be online and hosted by multiple Dj’s. Music, updates, interviews more. Something new

CodeUSA - Radio: DJ JoJo

Double xp is on until friday

Visit lumbridge and speak to The Doctor to begin unlocking some fancy lodestones


Latest update is FoG
